description.narrative: The main objectives of the Project is to expand and supplement the already existing secondary teacher training institutions and thus contribute both in quantity and quality to solution of the supply of adequately trained teachers. With the proposed output of about 900 qualified teachers per year, the project will alleviate the present shortage of trained teachers and conseqently improve the quality and relevance of secondary school instructions.

mailing-address.narrative: African Development Bank Group Headquarters Avenue Joseph Anoma 01 BP 1387 Abidjan 01, Côte d'Ivoire

description.narrative: Education - teacher training
